name: Mu - Watch Pet
description:
Mu is an adorable blob that lives in your Apple Watch. Level up your Mu by feeding it different foods, choosing the right exercises, and picking the right activities to have fun. Make sure to gain coins to spend on these activities by sending your Mu to work!

Features:
• RPG elements like leveling up, resource management, and stat upgrades.
• Easy to pickup and play, yet requires deep strategy and decision making.
• Beautiful hand-drawn animations bring Mu to life.
• Glance view on Apple Watch provides quick info about Mu
• Keep Mu happy and healthy by making sure the stats stay high!

* Minimum requirement for playing Mu is Apple Watch and iPhone 5 with iOS 8.2 or higher.
